column4: hi my wireless card could not be detected by ubuntu 10.10 upon installation. here is the output of lspci -v | less : http://pastebin.com/CC6RzTqp
how do i identify my card?
your wifi device is: 02:00.0 Ethernet controller: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. RTL8101E/RTL8102E PCI Express Fast Ethernet controller (rev 05)
